Module kivakit.core
Package com.telenav.kivakit.core.language.primitive

Class Doubles

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.core.language.primitive.Doubles
public class Doubles extends Object
Utility methods for working with double values
  • fastParse(String, double) - Fast parsing given a fixed number of decimal places
  • format(double) - The value formatted with only one decimal place
  • format(double, int) - The value formatted with the given number of decimal places
  • inRange(double, double, double) - Returns the given value constrained to the given range
  • isBetweenInclusive(double, double, double) - True if the value is in the given range
  • rounded(double) - Returns the given value rounded to the nearest int
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)

  • Method Details

    • fastParse

      public static double fastParse(String value, double denominator)
      A fast way to parse a simple double of the format xxx.yyyy where the number of digits in y is fixed. For example: 
       var result = fastParse("3.1415", 1_0000);
 assert result == 3.1415;
      Parameters:
      value - The value to parse
      denominator - The value to divide y by to get the digits to the right of the decimal place
      Returns:
      The double value

    • format

      public static String format(double value)
      Returns:
      The double value formatted with only one decimal place

    • format

      public static String format(double value, int decimals)
      Returns:
      The double value formatted with the given number of decimal places

    • inRange

      public static double inRange(double value, double minimum, double maximum)
      Returns the value constrained to the given range, inclusive.
      Parameters:
      value - The value
      minimum - The minimum value (inclusive)
      maximum - The maximum value (inclusive)
      Returns:
      The value constrained to the given range

    • isBetweenInclusive

      public static boolean isBetweenInclusive(double value, double minimum, double maximum)
      Returns true if the value is in the given range, inclusive.
      Parameters:
      value - The value
      minimum - The minimum value (inclusive)
      maximum - The maximum value (inclusive)
      Returns:
      True if the value is between the minimum and maximum, inclusive.

    • rounded

      public static int rounded(double value)
      Returns the given value rounded to the nearest int
      Parameters:
      value - The value to round
      Returns:
      The rounded value
